game_description: 1. Meet Kakao Friends in VR. 2. With lovely Friends, set up strategies and play. 3. Be a ranker with points you earn from the multiplay mode. 4. Meet players and make friends in the Friends VR world. 5. Purchase and decorate costumes from the shop.
Languages: English, English (Australia), English (UK), English (US), English (Canada), English (South Africa), Chinese (China), Chinese (Hong Kong), Chinese (Taiwan), French (Canada), French (France), German, German (Switzerland), Japanese, Korean, Russian, Spanish (Puerto Rico), Spanish (Spain)
review_1: IF YOU TRY WITH YOUR KIDS, I RECOMMEND THIS GAME. :) THIS IS VERY CUTIE AS U CAN SEE. BUT IT NEED MORE STRATEGIES THAN YOU THINK SOMETIME. AND THE COSTUMES!! DRIVE ME CRAZY HAHAHA.. IMO, ITâ€™S WORTH TRYING THIS.
